name: Kepler-69c
description:
In the year 2050, Humans sent the most advanced Blackbox#15155 robot to find water on Kepler-69c. But it was a rough landing and Blackbox#15155 has been dismasted into 50 parts. you need to collect at-least 80% of the parts before the battery of the Blackbox#15155 runout. Only then you can send signal to earth and we can explore more on our new home.to be continued.., 

Note: Made the Game in 10 hours straight. So pardon me for any errors.

Thanks & Regards, Prad3
